programs.name: Typhoon Response Unit
programs.shortDescription: Rapid deployment teams providing immediate relief, search and rescue, and recovery support during natural disasters.
programs.fullDescription: Our Typhoon Response Unit is a highly trained team of volunteers equipped to respond within 24 hours of a disaster declaration. We provide emergency shelter, food distribution, medical assistance, and debris clearing operations.
services: Emergency evacuation assistance and temporary shelter management
Relief goods distribution (food packs, hygiene kits, clothing)
Search and rescue operations in coordination with local authorities
Post-disaster assessment and recovery planning
Psychosocial first aid for trauma survivors

programs.name: Mobile Health Caravan
programs.shortDescription: Bringing quality healthcare to remote barangays through mobile medical missions and telemedicine services.
programs.fullDescription: The Mobile Health Caravan addresses healthcare gaps in underserved communities by deploying fully equipped medical units to remote areas. Our volunteer doctors, nurses, and paramedics provide free consultations, basic treatments, and health education.
services: General medical consultations and health screenings
Pediatric care and immunization programs
Dental checkups and basic treatments
Maternal health services and prenatal care
Free medicine distribution for common ailments
Health education and preventive care workshops

programs.name: Blood Heroes Program
programs.shortDescription: Maintaining critical blood supply through regular donation drives and emergency blood bank coordination.
programs.fullDescription: Blood Heroes addresses the critical shortage of blood supply in Philippine hospitals. We organize regular blood donation drives, maintain a database of volunteer donors, and coordinate emergency blood requests 24/7.
services: Quarterly blood donation drives in major cities and universities
Mobile blood donation units for workplace and community drives
24/7 emergency blood request hotline and coordination
Donor registry and notification system for rare blood types
Blood typing and screening services
Health education on the importance of blood donation

programs.name: Kabuhayan Plus Program
programs.shortDescription: Empowering disaster-affected families with skills training and entrepreneurship support for sustainable recovery.
programs.fullDescription: Kabuhayan Plus goes beyond immediate relief by providing disaster survivors with practical skills and business capital to rebuild their livelihoods. We offer training in various trades and provide starter kits to launch microenterprises.
services: Food processing and preservation techniques
Sewing, tailoring, and garment production
Small-scale agriculture and urban gardening
Handicrafts and artisan product development
Digital literacy and online selling platforms
Basic bookkeeping and business management

programs.name: Youth Brigade Initiative
programs.shortDescription: Developing the next generation of humanitarian leaders through youth volunteer programs and leadership training.
programs.fullDescription: Youth Brigade mobilizes students and young professionals aged 15-30 to become active volunteers and community leaders. Through structured training and hands-on experience, we cultivate a culture of service among Filipino youth.
services: First aid and disaster preparedness training
Community service projects and outreach programs
Environmental conservation and tree-planting initiatives
Peer education on health and wellness topics
Leadership development workshops and seminars
Youth-led fundraising and awareness campaigns

programs.name: Wellness & Psychosocial Support
programs.shortDescription: Mental health services and psychosocial support for disaster survivors and vulnerable communities.
programs.fullDescription: Recognizing that disasters affect mental health as much as physical wellbeing, our Wellness program provides professional psychosocial support to help individuals and communities recover from trauma and build resilience.
services: Individual and group counseling sessions
Psychological first aid training for frontliners
Stress management and coping skills workshops
Support groups for disaster survivors and families
Mental health awareness campaigns
Referral services to specialized mental health professionals
